name: foreseeable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A foreseeable event or situation is one that can be known about or guessed before it happens. in/for the foreseeable future
C2 as far into the future as you can imagine or plan for: I'll be living here for the foreseeable future.

able to be understood in advance: Unfortunately, he was likely to remain in power for the foreseeable future (= for a long time, beyond which no one could say what would happen).
